data.meta_description: Embassy Suites by Hilton™ Rockford Riverfront & Rockford Conference Center, located in downtown Rockford, defines uniqueness with its industrial chic' look and feel. Located at 416 S. Main Street, the completely repurposed and renovated property is Winnebago County's largest and only full-service hotel in the downtown area, boasting 160 spacious two-room suites, two restaurants, indoor pool & hot tub, golf simulator, fitness center, and more than 20,000 square feet of conference meeting space. Hotel amenities include a free two-hour evening reception with mixed drinks, beer, wine & soda along with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet with cooked-to-order omelets each morning.
data.text:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton™ Rockford Riverfront

Embassy Suites by Hilton™ Rockford Riverfront, located in downtown Rockford, defines uniqueness with its industrial chic' look and feel. Located at 416 S. Main Street, the completely repurposed and renovated property is Winnebago County's largest and only full-service hotel in the downtown area, boasting 160 spacious two-room suites, two restaurants, indoor pool & hot tub, golf & sports simulator, fitness center, and more than 20,000 square feet of conference meeting space. Hotel amenities include a free two-hour evening reception with mixed drinks, beer, wine & soda along with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet with cooked-to-order omelets each morning.

For added convenience, the hotel is located a short 10-minute drive from the Chicago Rockford International Airport, and walking distance to the BMO Harris Bank Center and the historic Coronado Performing Arts Center. Explore more of what downtown Rockford has to offer with an array of locally owned restaurants & shops, the Burpee Museum of Natural History, Discovery Center, and so much more! Embassy Suites Rockford Riverfront – Everything right where you need it.
